channel.title: I need help.....badd!
channel.description:
CAN SOMEONE PLEASE EXPLAIN TO ME THE STEPS ON HOW TO MAKE A SERVER I MADE 1 BUT THE IP IS 0.0.0.0 AND I TRY TO GET ON IT TO EDIT AND IT WONT LET ME AND I NEED TO KNOW HOW TO PUT NPCS,MAKE MODS,PUT RARES IN THE GEN SHOP SO PEOPLE CAN BUY AND I NEED TO KNOW HOW TO PUT IN COMMANDS SO PEOPLE CAN USE AND I WANT TO KNOW IF IT IS A PRIVATE SERVER OR NOT AND I NEED TO KNOW HOW TO SPAWN ITEMS......BASICALLY CAN SOME1 TELL ME HOW TO MAKE A DESENT SERVER???[b][u]PLEASE!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!![/u][/b]
P.S.if you have aim or will downalod aim soon and know how to do this add rsruler101 and contact me and please tell me how to make a desent server

item.title: I need help.....badd!
item.dc:creator: @xxlukexx xxlukexx
item.description:
@xxlukexx wrote:

in client.java, find the very first command and go through them all, adding or deleteing what you want and dont want. even change the playerrights.

0 = normal player
1 = mod
2 = admin
3 = owner

shop.cfg.

change items in the shop.

i am not spoon feeding you. go read tuts on how to do the basics.

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars

also a thread that will help if you spend 30mins of your life to make a server.

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars

also spend time reading threw this, it will help with coding.

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars

spawning, commands, ect ect are the coding that you should know in less than a day.

Read full topic

item.title: I need help.....badd!
item.dc:creator: @smashbro345 smashbro345
item.description:
@smashbro345 wrote:

To Make Items And Npc’s Type these codes
for monsters/npcs
::npc x (X= And Npc number) e.g. ::npc 1
To make items…
::pickup X 1 (e.g. ::pickup 900 1000)

Read full topic
